oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Collins fragmentation function for pions and kaons in a spectator model

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We calculate the Collins fragmentation function in the framework of a spectator model with pseudoscalar pionâ€“quark coupling and a Gaussian form factor at the vertex. We determine the model parameters by fitting the unpolarized fragmentation function for pions and kaons. We show that the Collins function for the pions in this model is in reasonable agreement with recent parametrizations obtained by fits of the available data. In addition, we compute for the first time the Collins function for the kaons.
